snippet.title: Chaos on Deponia - Game trailer EN
snippet.description:
Watch this game trailer and get a glimpse at this wonderfull and extremly funny point&click adventure. The story of Rufus and his friends continues and is even more humorous and bizar than it was in "Deponia". 

We hope you like the trailer and don't miss "Chaos on Deponia" from November 6th on Steam. Read further and buy the game here: http://goo.gl/9i3Mc

For further infortmation visit us on Facebook or go to the official homepage.

www.facebook.com/daedalic
www.deponia.de/en
www.daedalic.de/en
